headline: Altria (MO): Margin Compression Reinforces Investor Concerns Despite Attractive Valuation and Dividend
summary: Altria Group (MO) reported that revenue is expected to decline by 2.2% per year over the next three years, while EPS is forecast to grow at a modest 2.3% annually, which is well behind the broader US market’s anticipated 15.9% pace. The company’s net profit margin sits at 39.3%, down from last year’s 50.4%, reflecting clear margin compression. Despite robust historic earnings growth averaging 28.8% per year over the past five years, recent results revealed negative year-over-year earnings...

headline: 5 Must-Own Dividend Stocks Offer Reliable Passive Income for Life
summary: Five quality companies have paid reliably remain among our best ideas for those seeking dependable dividends.
